item.description: Expand your hiking skills and outlook on winter. Workshop will provide information on hike preparation, proper gear, hydration, nutrition and more for winter hiking. Intro session may be combined with Advanced Workshop scheduled for Nov 14th. Workshop will be followed by a graduated series of hikes from December to February. Priority for participation in this series will be given to workshop participants. Workshop is free for AMC members; $5 for non-members. FMI and to Register: http://activities.outdoors.org/search/index.cfm/action/details/id/62512

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Rescheduled - Winter Hiking Workshop
